sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect, useRef} from "react" import './CharityItem.scss' import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import SideBar from "./SideBar"; import { BsStars } from 'react-icons/bs' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import { FiMail } from "react-icons/fi"; export default function CharityItem({title, location, category, size, isInternational, score}) { return (

{title}

{location}

{`${category==='human'?'Human Rights & Services':category}`}

{`${size}-Sized`}

{(isInternational)&&

International

}

{score}

) }
